All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
DatabaseManager
Class that contains methods to read details of existing projects from the poise_pms database and write details of existing projects and completed projects to the database.
Main
This is the main class of the Poised Engineering Project Management System.
MenuOptions
Class that contains various methods to update the details of existing projects.
Person
Person class to construct and create person objects.
Project
Project class to construct and create project objects.
ProjectAdd
Class to capture the details of a new project.
